alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 4:10AM EDT until March 15 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches from the Boston Hills to the Chautauqua Ridge, with only 1 to 3 inches along the Lake Erie shore and southeastern Cattaraugus County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce some blowing and drifting snow in open areas. * WHERE...Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EDT Wednesday. The bulk of the snow will fall today through early this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult with poor visibility and snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute today.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
